Content:: Herbert Rowland Askins (November 12, 1898 - December 1982)[1][2] of Arizona was United States Assistant Secretary of the Navy from October 3, 1951, until January 20, 1953.  This biography of a person who has held a non-elected position in the federal government of the United States is a stub. You can help Wikipedia by expanding it.
